car.description: Selling 2012 Ford Focus se , 2.0L , 4cyl , automatic transmission has 250kms, 5 seats , loaded with keyless entrey , AC,FM/AM , power windows , power lock cloth seats ,heated seats , block heater , and much more...

Selling 2002 Toyota Celica , 1.8L , 4cyl , automatic transmission has only 223kms , 5seats , loaded with keyless entry , AC,FM/AM , power windows , power lock cloth seats ,sunroof, block heater, and much more..

Selling 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan, 3.6L, 6cyl, automatic transmission has 320kms ,7seats , loaded with keyless entrey , AC,FM/AM , power windows , power lock , cloth seats ,block heater, stow and go seats , back up camera , touch screen , and much more...

Selling 2003 BMW X5 3.0i AWD , automatic transmission has 205kms , 5 seats , loaded with keyless entry , AC,FM/AM , power windows , power lock , Leather seats, heated seats , block heater, sunroof and much more...
